metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39615 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** Xmlsoft Libxml2 v2.11.0 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via the xmlSAX2StartElement() function at /libxml2/SAX2.c. This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via supplying a crafted XML file. NOTE: the vendor's position is that the product does not support the legacy SAX1 interface with custom callbacks; there is a crash even without crafted input.

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
